tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Burzin Khan is the original painless dentist. He had to do a major extraction, and I suffered no pain or even discomfort. He has the most incredible manner that fills me with confidence and I enjoy his sense of humour and his very cool play list. You know that you are in safe, competent and friendly hands, and this is true for all the team at his clinic. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Burzin Khan and the team at OPUS Dental Specialties are phenomenal. My recent dental procedure was a success, thanks to Dr. Khan's expertise and the top-notch care I received.Dr. Khan's skill and professionalism are unmatched. From the advanced clinic to the attentive team, every aspect exceeded my expectations. The follow-up care was thorough, ensuring my recovery went smoothly.I highly recommend Dr. Khan and OPUS Dental Specialties for exceptional dental care. Thank you for a fantastic experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A teeth cleaning with a young doctor in an earlier appt, had him report to Dr Khan as to a questionable cause of mild shifting of 3 teeth implants had in 1994. 
Dr Khan voiced the possibility  of loosened screws that if proved to be so, would have him tighten them hopefully and successfully.  45 minutes later, with careful drilling, Dr Khan managed to locate old drivers that completed the job of tightening the screws. 

The experience was a happy one for which I am very grateful too, for the careful explanation every step of the way, that made the procedure comfortable, if not even amusing. 

Thank you Dr Burzin Khan and attending Doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I am really happy that I reached out and consulted Dr Khan and in the 1st session itself decided to go ahead with the treatment protocol. 
The entire experience is very warm and very consultative with explanation in great details. You feel a part of the decision making process. 
Dr Khan is particularly very very communicative and friendly and gives great degree of personal care and attention. 
I was particularly very pleasantly surprised that he called me personally the day after the surgery to check how I was feeling. It was my 1st experience when a doctor has called on his own. Great gesture. 
Thanks Dr Khan for your care and treatment.
reply_text: Thank you Ajay for your kind review. We strive to achieve best results with patient satisfaction.....for your smiles unlimited!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would like to express my deep gratitude to Dr. Burzin Khan and Dr. Sunil Gohil for their ********* treatment. I was in a lot of pain when I called them, and they were very prompt in giving me an appointment. The experience at the clinic was amazing. Not only does it have state-of-the-art equipment but they truly are the best in their work. The root canal and cavity treatment went extremely smoothly and I am much better now. 

The clinic is also extremely hygienic and follows all the safety protocols with regards to Covid-19. I felt extremely safe there. 

I would specially like to commend them for working in these difficult times, this shows a lot of courage, and also dedication to their profession and patients. I highly recommend them.
reply_text: Thank you Rohan for your kind words.

Even though he's at the other end of the city, we always go to him for all dental issues.
reply_text: Thank you for your review!
